en-US.summary: Learn fun facts about rad women.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask rad women facts for a fact
Alexa tell rad women facts to tell me trivia
en-US.name: rad Women Facts
en-US.description:
Ask for rad Woman Facts, and be reminded just how awesome women are.

rad Women Facts provides you with remiders of the accomplisments and sass from women aroudn the world.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch rad Woman Facts" or "Alexa, open rad Woman Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
